txt.en: 'I wonder where I should go for lunch? The Green Dragon? The Ivy Bush?'
'I wonder what The Golden Perch is serving today? Meat pies or mutton?'
'Nothing finer than a bit of beer and a good meal, I say!'
'Gracious, I could even go for just bread and butter, I'm so hungry!'
'I'm a mite bit peckish. Perhaps I'll pop over to The Plough and Stars for a bite.'
